es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow
Class WhileDoFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.StructuredFlow
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.StructuredLoopFlow
                      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.WhileDoFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
FinalizerFlow, Flow, InitializerFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, StructuredFlow, StructuredLoopFlow, TaskFlow, WhileDoFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class WhileDoFlow
extends StructuredLoopFlow
implements WhileDoFlow

A structured loop flow which resembles a while-do loop. A precondition is checked before executing the internal flow. If the postcondition is false, this flow finishes.

Author:
ycallero

public void request(WorkThread wThread)
Description copied from interface: Flow
Requests this flow. An element, by means of a work thread, requests this flow to carry it out.

Parameters:
